content: As I mentioned in my prepared remarks, in 2016 the last time we saw a cycle like this within 12 months at the end of that cycle whenever that happens it's assumed that what the other, our Confederate said that January is that, then say within 12 months of January, our auto insurance revenue had doubled because the combination of those two factors. And we're run rating it well over $100 million per year in annual revenue in the quarter so those businesses continue to do very well as we see increased consumer activity broadly in the economy, and therefore, with that activity comes the requirement or desire to access credit and to use credit.
